theme_color.label: Theme Color
theme_color.comment: Support 6 Color Styles.You can define other styles by changing parameters

google_font_targets.label: Google Font Elements
google_font_targets.comment: Tags will be applied with Google font with separate "," ( Ex: "h1, .classname" )

body_link_color.comment: Please Click the text box to select color

footer_style.label: Footer Style
footer_style.comment: Support 2 Footer Styles.You can define other styles by changing parameters

onecolumn_device_1200.label: Device's screen is greater than or equal to 1200px

onecolumn_device_992.label: Device's screen is greater than 992px or equal to 1199px

onecolumn_device_768.label: Device's screen is greater than 768px or equal to 991px

onecolumn_device_481.label: Device's screen is greater than 481px or equal to 767px

twocolumn_device_1200.label: Device's screen is greater than or equal to 1200px

twocolumn_device_992.label: Device's screen is greater than 992px or equal to 1199px

twocolumn_device_768.label: Device's screen is greater than 768px or equal to 991px

twocolumn_device_481.label: Device's screen is greater than 481px or equal to 767px

threecolumn_device_1200.label: Device's screen is greater than or equal to 1200px

threecolumn_device_992.label: Device's screen is greater than 992px or equal to 1199px

threecolumn_device_768.label: Device's screen is greater than 768px or equal to 991px

threecolumn_device_481.label: Device's screen is greater than 481px or equal to 767px

compress_css_js.label: Compress Css, Js
compress_css_js.comment: Use when merge css and merge js = Yes

enable_yuicompressor.label: Enable YUICompress
enable_yuicompressor.comment: this allows better minifications results. (requires Java)

import_blocks.label: Static Blocks
import_blocks.comment: Click this button to create all static blocks provided with this theme.

overwrite_blocks.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
overwrite_blocks.comment: If set to "Yes", imported blocks will overwrite existing blocks with the same identifiers (if any blocks with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

import_pages.label: Pages
import_pages.comment: Click this button to create CMS pages provided with this theme.

overwrite_pages.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
overwrite_pages.comment: If set to "Yes", imported pages will overwrite existing pages with the same identifiers (if any pages with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

import_menu.label: Megamenu Item
import_menu.comment: Click button to create demo data for Megamenu. Created data of megamenu will be removed.

product_information.label: Product Information
product_information.comment:
Author : Magen Tech

Version : 1.0.0

Userguide: Userguide

Support : http://www.magentech.com/forum
